text:
SALEM

National Child Labour Project: SMILE, Integrated Child Protection programme, refresher training for nodal teachers, block resource centre, Magudanchavadi,

9.30 a.m.

District administration: Grievances day meeting, V. Sampath, Collector, presides, Collectorate hall, 10 a.m.

Shri Sakthikailassh Women’s College: Department of Computer Science, P. Kalpana, assistant professor, Nehru Memorial College, Puthanampatti, speaks on ‘Python language’,

9.30 a.m.

National Book Trust and New Century Book House: National Book Festival book exhibition, Bose Maidan,

9.30 a.m.

and 9.30 p.m.

Cooptex: New Year and Pongal handloom

textiles exhibition, Bose Maidan, 10 a.m. to

8 p.m.

NAMAKKAL

District administration: Grievances day meeting, V. Dakshinamoorthy, Collector, presides, Collectorate hall, 10 a.m.

Department of Handlooms and Textiles: Pongal Festival handloom exhibition, Sri Namagiriamman Thirumana Mandapam, Kulakarai, 9.30 a.m.

RASIPURAM

Muthayammal College of Arts and Science: Entrepreneurship Development Cell, workshop on ‘Role of District Industries Centre in self employment’, K. Raasu, GM, DIC, P. Shanmugam, secretary, DIC, N. Elango, president, Namakkal District Small Industries Association, speak,

10.30 a.m.

KOMARAPALAYAM

Excel Group of Institutions: On campus recruitment drive by Gemini Communications Limited, Chennai, 9.30 a.m.
title: engagements
